attributes.action: Allow Workers the Right to Opt Out of wearing Safety Footwear at Work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think wearing Safety Boots at work is damn uncomfortable compared to trainers.

Although I appreciate my employers for considering my safety I do believe that I am the best judge of that.

Having worked there for 18 years, 17 of them wearing trainers, I have never had an accident.

I have however sustained Cut injuries to my hands but do not have to wear Safety gloves.

Sign my petition for a common sense approach in the Workplace.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
